page.title: 15Press and Radio in Dunmow
page.content: Most people in the area receive a national newspaper daily. The local area does publish a few weekly periodicals. The Dunmow and Braintree Times and the Dunmow Observer are rival papers covering local news, sports and events. Many people also receive free papers covering motoring and real estate. These contain little real news, mainly advertisements which pay for their publication. All these papers are delivered by paper boys and girls around the area. The area benefits due to location in that it can receive both Essex Radio and some London stations. The most popular station is Radio One though it is being challenged by off-shore pirate radio stations. However television is the clear leader in the distribution of views, news and entertainment.
